author: Staff Reporter
text:
A two-year-old girl was crushed under wheels of a lorry after the driver attempted to reverse the vehicle at a construction site in M.G.R. Nagar, on Sunday.

Police said the child, M. Keerthi, was playing near a tent at the construction site around 10 a.m. when the driver, Palaniswamy (39), from Salem, tired to reverse his lorry without noticing the child playing behind.

The child died on the spot. The body was sent to Kilpauk Medical College Hospital for post-mortem. A case has been filed by the M.G.R. Nagar police.— staff reporter
title: Girl child crushed under lorry
